topic: The Art of Persuasive Video Storytelling

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: journalistic and non-news digital platforms ? we will learn what makes a story powerful. We'll see how the masters of storytelling appeal to our senses and take us on a journey that helps an audience understand a complex issue or cause. We'll look at how character, images and a careful plotting of story beats affect the viewer ? in documentary shorts, short videos for NGOs as well as political and corporate image pieces. Coursework will include readings, classroom discussions, analyses of stories and a final project, done in groups, producing a video story for a local client.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value: Prerequisites are a visual or audio storytelling course at MEDILL: JOUR 322, JOUR 368 Documentary, Intro Photojournalism, Advanced Photojournalism or Audio Documentary.
